item.title: Francesca Battistelli - Heaven Everywhere
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: G, G6, Gmaj7, C, D, Em7, Em
As performed by Francesca Battistelli
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pH-GE0UeO9A
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at:
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: I Want a Ukulele for Christmas Lyric Based Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Created with chord letter names and lyrics so any non-transposing instrument can play along.
Chords used: G, Gmaj7, G7, C, Cm, C#dim, D7, E7, Dmaj7, Em, Gaug, Em6, Am7, Cm6, D7sus4
As performed by Steven Curtis Chapman
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/oYl8gEc3ldo
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/ss/steven-curtis-chapman/i-want-a-ukulele-for-christmas/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com

item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA

item.title: Sara Bareilles - Love Is Christmas
item.description:
“Love is Christmas” by Sara Bareilles. It’s been raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele and guitar students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: G, C, D, Em
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Billie Eilish - come out and play
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Come Out And Play - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am C Cmaj7 Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums or D DU D DU (slow)
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Traditional
Using the chords: A Am B C D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D or D DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
